mapper.select: select * from (select *,@rownum:=@rownum+1 as rnum from user_coupon, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP where user_id=#{user_id} order by user_coupon_date desc ) B where rnum>(#{page}-1)*5 AND rnum<=#{page}*5
